parts.text: {"word":"tronido","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(主にスペイン語圏) 雷鳴、轟音、破裂音","english_definition":"(Primarily Spanish-speaking regions) Thunderclap, loud noise, bang","examples":[{"sentence":"El tronido del trueno nos despertó.","translation":"The thunderclap woke us up.","english_translation":"The thunderclap woke us up."},{"sentence":"Se oyó un fuerte tronido al explotar el neumático.","translation":"A loud bang was heard when the tire exploded.","english_translation":"A loud bang was heard when the tire exploded."}],"collocations":["tronido de trueno (雷鳴)","fuerte tronido (大きな轟音)"],"synonyms":["estruendo","ruido fuerte","explosión"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"派生語源は不明だが、おそらく音を模倣した擬音語に由来する。","priority":"low"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/tɾoˈni.ðo/","syllables":"tro-ni-do"},"inflection":{"noun_gender":"masculine","noun_plural":"tronidos"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「tronido」は主にスペイン語圏で使用される単語で、英語の "thunderclap", "bang", "loud noise" に相当します。自然現象としての雷鳴や、爆発音、大きな破裂音などを指します。","priority":"medium"},"common_mistakes":{},"related_words":{"derivatives":["tronar (動詞: 雷が鳴る、爆発する、轟音を立てる)"],"phrasal_verbs":[]},"level_frequency":{},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「tronido」はスペイン語の単語で、英語を母語とする人には馴染みがないかもしれません。意味は雷鳴や爆発音のような大きな音を指します。スペイン語圏の文学作品や会話で遭遇する可能性があります。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"El **tronido** de la bomba sacudió el edificio.","translation":"The blast from the bomb shook the building.","type":"noun","meaning_category":"爆発音"},{"sentence":"Después del **tronido** del trueno, empezó a llover a cántaros.","translation":"After the thunderclap, it started to rain cats and dogs.","type":"noun","meaning_category":"雷鳴"}]}
